verses.roman:
lakṣa-saṅkhya loka āise, nāhika gaṇana
bāhira hañā prabhu dila daraśana

synonyms: lakṣa-saṅkhya—numbering hundreds of thousands; loka āise—people came; nāhika gaṇana—there is no counting; bāhira hañā—coming out; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dila daraśana—gave audience.
translation: People came by hundreds of thousands, and no one could count them. Therefore Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu came out of the house to give audience to the people.
